subject: Tests and Testing
Steroids
Drugs (Pharmaceuticals)
lead_paragraph: Cycling’s governing body provisionally suspended the Austrian rider Christian Pfannberger after a positive drug test. The U.C.I. confirmed that Pfannberger tested positive for EPO in an out-of-competition check March 19. He has been provisionally suspended pending analysis of his backup B sample. U.C.I.’s announcement came a day after Pfannberger withdrew from the Giro d’Italia and was suspended from the Katusha team.
